price: ߣߌ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߘߏ߲߬ ߞߊ߬ ߝߕߌ߫ ߖߌߘߊ߲ߣߍ߲߫ ߢߐ߲߰ ߖߎ߯ߡߊ߲߫ ߞߍ߫ ߏ߬ ߘߴߏ߬ ߦߋ߫
arabic: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٖ شَرّٗا يَرَهُۥ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: waman yaʿmal mith'qāla dharratin sharran yarahu
